message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: JSONArray jsonArray = object.names();
ArrayList<String> locationList = new ArrayList<String>();
for (int i = 0; i < jsonArray.length(); i++) {
    String key = jsonArray.getString(i);
    String value = object.getString(key);
    locationList.add(value);
}
<<<explanation>>>: In order to iterate through the JSON object in the same order as when they were inserted, you can use the JSONArray returned by object.names(). This will give you an array of keys in the order they were inserted. Then, you can loop through the JSONArray and retrieve the corresponding values from the JSON object.
